author: @conan_daily
title: Downey, California priest Jaime Arriaga accused of abusing girl - CONAN Daily
text:
Jaime Arriaga Pedroza, 41, of Downey, Los Angeles County, California, United States is a Catholic priest. He was initially a deacon before joining the Archdiocese of Los Angeles, which comprises California’s Los Angeles County, Santa Barbara County and Ventura County.
Archdiocese of Los Angeles
From 1985 to 2011, Roger Michael Mahony served as the archbishop of the Archdiocese of Los Angeles. On July 16, 2007, he and the archdiocese reached a settlement worth $660 million with 508 alleged victims of sexual abuse by priests.
In 2011, José Horacio Gómez Velasco became the fifth archbishop of the archdiocese. In 2014, the archdiocese agreed to pay $13 million to settle 17 sex abuse lawsuits.
From May 2019 to December 2019, the archdiocese provided documents to California state attorney Xavier Becerra in preparation for a series of pending lawsuits and in January 2020, the archdiocese settled a sexual abuse case against a former archdiocesan priest for $1.9 million. On October 16, 2024, the archdiocese reached a $880 million settlement over 1,354 child sexual abuse claims.
Jaime Arriaga
In January 2024, Arriaga joined Our Lady of Perpetual Help Church in Downey and Saint Louis of France Catholic Church in La Puente, Los Angeles County as a priest. On June 1, 2024, he was ordained as a priest.
On March 22, 2025, Arriaga allegedly sexually abused a girl. On April 2, 2025, the Archdiocese of Los Angeles received a report on the allegation.
On April 3, 2025, Arriaga was arrested. He was charged with eight felony counts related to sexual abuse including assault and lewd acts on a child.
On April 7, 2025, Arriaga was arraigned and he pleaded not guilty to the charges. On April 8, 2025, the Archdiocese of Los Angeles was removed from ministry at Our Lady of Perpetual Help Church in Downey.
On June 5, 2025, Arriaga will appear in Los Angeles Municipal Court in Los Angeles, Los Angeles County. He is being held without bail at the Men’s Central Jail in Los Angeles.

Jamal Lewis, do São Paulo, pode estrear contra o Cruzeiro no dia 15 Imagem: Reprodução/Instagram/jamal_lewis1 Jamal Lewis não possui mais qualquer empecilho para não estrear pelo São Paulo. Nesta quinta-feira (5) o lateral esquerdo britânico apareceu no BID da CBF e, com isso, teve sua situação regularizada para começar a ser acionado pelo técnico Luis Zubeldía.
O próximo compromisso do São Paulo acontece no dia 12, quinta-feira, contra o Atlético-MG , fora de casa, pela volta das quartas de final da Copa do Brasil. Para essa partida, entretanto, Jamal Lewis não poderá ser relacionado, já que o regulamento da competição prevê que novas inscrições poderão ser feitas antes do início de uma das fases. Ou seja, ele só poderá participar da campanha do Tricolor no torneio, caso o time elimine o Galo e avance para a semifinal.
Já no duelo do dia 15, contra o Cruzeiro, no Mineirão, pelo Campeonato Brasileiro , Jamal Lewis, enfim, terá condições de fazer sua estreia com a camisa do São Paulo, caso o técnico Luis Zubeldía ache que ele está pronto para contribuir com a equipe dentro de campo.
Josias de Souza
Em meio à divinização das pesquisas, somem ideias
Mariana Grilli
Algodão brasileiro quer mais espaço na Ásia
Casagrande
Lesão é fatalidade, e Pedro voltará ainda mais forte
Matheus Pichonelli
Pablo Marçal busca voto na base do estereótipo
Resta saber se o treinador argentino irá relacionar o lateral esquerdo britânico, uma vez que ele não participará de boa parte da intertemporada do São Paulo nesses próximos dias por ter sido convocado para defender a seleção da Irlanda do Norte nesta Data Fifa de setembro, disputando a Liga das Nações.
Nesta quinta-feira, Jamal Lewis começou a partida contra Luxemburgo, no Windsor Park, em Belfast, pela Liga C da Liga das Nações, mas foi acionado no início do segundo tempo para ajudar a manter a vitória parcial por 2 a 0 construída na etapa inicial. No próximo domingo, o adversário será a Bulgária, fora de casa.
Enquanto Jamal Lewis não retorna ao Brasil para iniciar os treinamentos com o elenco do São Paulo, Luis Zubeldía seguirá trabalhando com a única opção de origem para a lateral esquerda disponível: Welington. Com o garoto Patryck Lanza se recuperando de uma fratura na clavícula, o treinador argentino deverá recorrer ao meia-atacante Michel Araújo, improvisado, caso haja necessidade de utilizar algum outro atleta no setor.

author: Jon Stojan
title: Why chauffeur services are the preferred choice for London travellers - News | Khaleej Times
text:
London is a busy city where time is important and first impressions matter. Therefore, transportation may considerably affect one's experience. Chauffeur services have emerged as the preferred choice for discerning London travellers. From the convenience and comfort they offer to the assurance of a seamless journey, compelling factors make chauffeur services stand out.
This article will explore why chauffeur services are gaining immense popularity in the UK. Let's explore these reasons in detail.
The convenience of door-to-door service One of the most significant advantages of using a chauffeur service in London is the convenience of door-to-door transportation. Instead of navigating the complexities of public transport or hailing a taxi, passengers can arrange for a chauffeur to pick them up at their location and level them off at their desired destination. This level of convenience is unmatched, especially for travellers with heavy luggage or those looking for a stress-free commute.
Stress-free airport transfers For international travellers arriving at London's airports, chauffeur services provide a seamless transfer experience. Chauffeurs monitor flight schedules and adjust pickup times accordingly, ensuring passengers don't have to worry about delays. This reliability is a significant selling point for those seeking a smooth transition from the airport to their hotel or any other location in the city.
Luxury and comfort Regarding luxury and comfort, chauffeur services are second to none. Passengers are treated to well-maintained, high-end cars equipped with plush leather seats, climate control, and amenities like Wi-Fi. This comfort level is perfect for travellers who want to relax and enjoy the ride while taking in the sights of London. The spacious interiors of these cars provide ample legroom, allowing passengers to stretch out and unwind during their journey. Luxury Chauffeur Service London provides executive luxury transport solutions for customers.
Personalised service Chauffeurs are known for their professionalism and attention to detail. They provide a personalised experience, catering to each passenger's specific needs and preferences. Whether adjusting the temperature, selecting preferred music, or offering refreshments, chauffeurs go the extra mile to ensure a memorable journey.
Time efficiency In a city where time is of the essence, chauffeur services offer unparalleled time efficiency. Chauffeurs are well-versed in London's traffic patterns and can navigate congested areas to ensure on-time arrivals. It is particularly crucial for business travellers who must arrive on time for meetings or appointments. With chauffeur services, you can count on reaching your destination promptly, allowing you to make the most of your valuable time.
Versatility in travel Chauffeur services are not limited to airport transfers; they can be used for various purposes. Whether attending a business conference, exploring tourist attractions, or simply getting from point A to B, chauffeurs are versatile and adaptable, making them an ideal choice for any travel need. Their flexibility ensures that you have a reliable mode of transportation for all your London adventures.
Safety and reliability Safety is a top priority for London travellers, and chauffeur services are known for their commitment to ensuring passenger safety. Chauffeurs are highly trained and experienced professionals, often with extensive knowledge of the city's roadways and traffic conditions. They prioritise safe driving practices and defensive techniques, providing passengers a secure and smooth journey.
Furthermore, Limousine chauffeur service cars used by chauffeur services undergo rigorous and regular maintenance and safety checks, ensuring they are always in optimal condition. This dedication to safety gives passengers peace of mind throughout their travels in London.
24/7 availability London is a city that never sleeps, and neither do chauffeur services. These services are available round the clock, 365 days a year, making them a reliable choice for late-night or early-morning travel needs. Whether you have an early morning flight to catch or land in London late at night, you can count on chauffeurs to be there when needed. Their unwavering availability ensures that you can rely on them no matter the hour, adding extra convenience to your travel plans.
Cost-effective options Contrary to common misconceptions, chauffeur services in London can be surprisingly cost-effective, especially when travelling in groups or longer distances. By splitting the cost among passengers, chauffeur services often become competitive compared to taking multiple taxis or using public transportation. This affordability, combined with the added benefits of comfort and convenience, makes chauffeur services an attractive choice for various travellers, including budget-conscious individuals and families.
Transparent pricing Most chauffeur services provide transparent pricing with no hidden fees or surprises. Passengers can easily obtain a quote upfront when booking their chauffeur, ensuring they know the total cost of their journey. This transparency is highly appreciated by budget-conscious travellers who want to plan their expenses accurately. Knowing the cost in advance allows passengers to make informed decisions and avoid unexpected charges, contributing to a hassle-free and enjoyable travel experience.
Final words Chauffeur services have emerged as the preferred choice for London travellers due to their unparalleled convenience, luxury, time efficiency, safety, and versatility. Whether you're a tourist exploring the city or a business professional with a hectic schedule, chauffeur services offer a reliable and comfortable mode of transportation.

author: cri.cn
title: 第27届湖南（南山）六月六山歌节将于7月30日在城步举行-国际在线
text:
“苗乡人民爱唱歌，男方唱了女方和，新世纪来新面貌，情满清山歌满坡……”连日来，在湖南省邵阳市城步苗族自治县长安营镇长安营村，非物质文化遗产传承人、山歌皇后陈岩花和弟子们正在抓紧练习原生态山歌，为即将到来的第27届湖南（南山）六月六山歌节做准备。
第27届湖南（南山）六月六山歌节主视觉 供图 城步苗族自治县委宣传部
　　据悉，7月30日（农历闰六月初六）至8月2日，以“一路山歌上南山”为主题的第27届湖南（南山）六月六山歌节将在城步举行。本届山歌节包含“2+1+3”系列活动，即“城步KOL达人团”苗岭星声力、“暑约山歌·凉趣城步”休闲避暑季两项预热活动，“一路山歌上南山”第27届湖南（南山）六月六山歌节全民大联欢以及“一路奔跑上南山·致敬劳动美”避暑康养跑、“一路美景上南山”民俗体验活动、“一路美品上南山”非遗美食园游会三项配套活动。其中，第27届湖南（南山）六月六山歌节全民大联欢7月30日晚上将在该县民族文化体育中心（外场）举行。
　　湖南（南山）六月六山歌节缘起城步长安营镇，已连续举办26届，成为湖南省四大民俗节庆品牌之一，获评“中国优秀当代节庆奖”“纪念改革开放40周年”中国优秀节事奖等，入选第四批国家公共文化服务体系示范项目。城步因此跻身“中国最具影响力文化旅游百强县”“中国区域休闲旅游目的地城市”“中国最美县域榜单”“中国最美乡村百佳县市”。
南山牧场自然风光 供图 城步苗族自治县委宣传部
　　近年来，为进一步弘扬民族文化，促进民族团结进步，推动文旅产业深度融合，该县以持续举办湖南（南山）六月六山歌节为契机，着力打造县城、南山两大核心文旅集中地，注重答好两道“融合命题”，正在加快建设湘西南生态文化旅游圈核心区、湖南省生态文化旅游强县、全国重要旅游目的地。今年一季度，该县接待游客173万人次，实现旅游综合收入18.1亿元，分别增长14.37%、11.74%。（文 阳望春 吕伟铭）

author: Express News Service
title: Odisha govt tightens norms for re-engagement of retired employees
text:
BHUBANESWAR: Doing away with the indiscriminate post-retirement re-engagement of officers by the previous BJD regime, the BJP government on Thursday issued comprehensive guidelines banning reappointment of retired employees for routine and day-to-day office work.
A resolution in this regard issued by the General Administration department repealed the earlier guidelines issued by the BJD government in 2014 and stated that re-engagement of retired employees will be considered only in rare cases. The reappointment will have to be approved by the chief minister after recommendation by a four-member committee headed by the chief secretary.
The guidelines stated retired employees up to 65 years of age and those who are fit will be considered for re-engagement. If the past experience of retired employees is highly required, only then his or her case will be considered for re-engagement on contractual basis.
Employees having outstanding CCR/PAR for continuous 60 months before superannuation will be considered for re-engagement on temporary basis after retirement. Employees against whom departmental proceedings had been initiated or had been punished for misconduct within five years before retirement will not be considered.
The guidelines said initially the re-engagement will be for one year. The tenure can be extended for one year each thrice if the performance of the employees is found satisfactory. Besides, there will be extension of tenure only if the vacant post has not been filled by regular recruitment process. Reappointed employees can be dismissed with one month notice or can resign by giving notice of the same duration.
It is stated that during 2010-2014, government establishments had been facing acute shortage of manpower on account of delayed recruitment for various reasons resulting in heavy workload on the existing staff. The government in August, 2014, decided to re-engage retired employees having professional expertise temporarily on contractual basis for different spells with certain terms and conditions.
However, it has now come to the notice that different departments, offices are engaging retired government employees in a routine manner without proper justification. Such re-engagements are being given merely to deal with the day-to-day routine works. They are done despite there being no compelling justification for such engagement, the resolution stated.
“After careful consideration of the above situation and with a view to ensure a uniform principle, the government has decided that if vacancies arise for dealing with routine works, the department or office concerned will take measures to fill up these through direct, promotional recruitment,” the resolution added.

author: Angela Hatke
title: Save During Penguin Days at the Cincinnati Zoo
text:
Save During Penguin Days at the Cincinnati Zoo
Enjoy un-brrr-lievable discounts January 8 – March 8
CINCINNATI, OH (January 5, 2024) — March to the Cincinnati Zoo during
Penguin Days, presented by U.S. Bank, at the Cincinnati Zoo & Botanical Garden! Visitors will enjoy deeply discounted Zoo admission January 8 through March 8 and can see Penguin Parades Saturdays and Sundays at 11 a.m. (and holiday Mondays) through the end of February. This will be the last year for these parades, so don’t miss your last chance to see king penguins waddle through the Zoo.
“I’m sad to see the Penguin Parades end, but our flock is aging and ready to retire. Marching has always been voluntary, and the birds that consistently want to walk will still do so this year,” said Cincinnati Zoo director Thane Maynard.
In addition to Penguin Parades, there will be
special animal encounters on the weekends. Learn more about otters, insects, wolves, keas, and African painted dogs from the keepers that care for them.
“There’s still a lot to do and see at the Zoo on cold days, and the discounted admission makes a winter visit even more attractive,” said Maynard. “I could spend all day in the award-winning World of the Insect!”
Other indoor habitats include Birds of the World, Manatee Springs, Night Hunters, Jungle Trails, Reptile House, Dragons, and Discovery Forest. Gorillas are viewable in their indoor habitat, and the world-famous hippos will be out if temps are above 40 degrees.
If you’re still feeling festive,
PNC Festival of Lights runs through January 7. The Cincinnati Zoo opens daily at 10 a.m. Starting Monday, closing time will be 5 p.m. For more information, visit http://cincinnatizoo.org/.

organizations.name: cincinnati zoo save during penguin days
